title: Game Resolution Support
body:
Ya know.. It's pretty sad that Riot Games a multi million maybe even billion dollar company can't seem to put 2k and 4k resolution support and fix other UI problems etc..

I can't run the game at any higher than 1280x1024 without some part of the game being cut off and not being able to see scores or mana bar or the bottom half of my minimap etc.. and it's honestly bullshit.. this isn't 1998 where we're all playing Starcraft or some other old ass game..

Riot Games stop being lazy please. k thx.
